text: E jenumanja ŵankulupilile! Kumbuchilani chindimba cha Allah pa jenumanja, pandema jaŵasachilile ŵandu kuti ajongole makono gao kukwenu (kusaka kumputa ngondo), basi (Allah) ni ŵagachijile makono gaogo kuti gakanyyichila ŵanganyammwe, soni mun'jogopani Allah, soni kwa Allah pe basi ajegamile ŵakulupilila
